entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generation silently crashes when using wrong compiler version #66681
  • Simplify closure conversion using ref fields #66680
  • BlockSyntax capturing - cannot detect in declarations #66676
  • FindCallersAsync not able to find all the callers specially protected one #66671

Closed

  • VB: IDE hangs when Intellisense auto-complete is invoked on semantically invalid code. #24261
    Backlog
  • Code fixes (at least use auto property) doesn't respect tabs vs spaces settings #25407
    Backlog
  • C# alias intellisense trouble #25978
    Backlog
  • Empty type in peek definition for tuples #29523
    Backlog
  • TODO comments show false positives #31166
    Backlog
  • "Invert if" removes newlines #42715
    Backlog
  • Convert local function to method does not respect ref return type #32975
    Backlog
  • F12 on `using` should navigate to object's `Dispose( )` method #37842
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix formatting issue with convert-to-full-prop #66686
    Area-IDE
  • Handle captured primary constructor parameters in readonly context. #66685
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • ⚡️Share AssemblyloadTestFixture on Framework #66684
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't overwrite binary logs in CI #66683
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add some EE and EnC tests for primary constructors #66677
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix XmlDocumentationProvider to return the entire XML node #66668
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Split normalizer tests #66590
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • NRT enable a language service #66679
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable publishing from a dev branch #66678
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Support goto def to a Dispose method when on a 'using' statement #66659
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66673
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve spacing on trivia for invert if #66660
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Preserve refkind when converting local function to method #66661
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reduce copies in shadow load #66662
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Updated

  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid directory enumerations in DeleteLeftoverDirectories #66656
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid compacting TransformNode's state table #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
